## **<i class="fas fa-code"></i> Interactive R Packages Used**

```r
# Core visualization packages
library(plotly)      # Interactive plots
library(ggplot2)     # Grammar of graphics
library(DT)          # Interactive tables
library(leaflet)     # Interactive maps
library(shiny)        # Web applications
library(flexdashboard) # Dashboard layouts
library(patchwork)    # Combining plots
library(scales)       # Formatting scales
```

::: {.highlight-box}
### <i class="fas fa-lightbulb"></i> Visualization Philosophy

I believe data visualization should be both beautiful and functional. Every chart tells a story, and interactive elements help viewers explore the narrative at their own pace. Whether it's animated time series, interactive maps, or responsive dashboards, the goal is always to make data accessible and insights actionable.
:::
